items.title: California DMV records show Tesla has logged zero autonomous test miles on the state's roads since 2019, despite Musk's claims of an imminent CA robotaxi launch (Chris Kirkham/Reuters)
items.title_en: California DMV records show Tesla has logged zero autonomous test miles on the state's roads since 2019, despite Musk's claims of an imminent CA robotaxi launch (Chris Kirkham/Reuters)
items.title_zh: 加州DMV记录显示，尽管马斯克声称加州即将推出自动驾驶出租车，但自2019年以来，特斯拉在该州道路上的自动驾驶测试英里数为零（Chris Kirkham/路透社）
